basic.description: Rheology provides a valuable tool for the assessment of the processability of polymers in various operations, as well as the identification of their structure. This 6 week (3 hours/week) module will discuss the fundamental relations between the rheology and structure of polymers and the principles of rheometry. M. Kontopoulou (0.25 weight)
basic.subject: CHEE
basic.title: Polymer Rheology
